description: First differences of the central trinomial coefficients A002426.
comments: Previous name was: "a(n) = number of (s(0), s(1), ..., s(n)) such that s(i) is an integer, s(0) = 0 = s(n), |s(1)| = 1, |s(i) - s(i-1)| <= 1 for i >= 2. Also a(n) = T(n,n), where T is the array defined in A025177."Note that n-1 divides a(n) for n>=2. - _T. D. Noe_, Mar 16 2005
